content: **knit look crochet hat** you can easily tell the difference between crochet and knit right this little hat might make you look twice it s 100% crochet with a knit-look thanks to the slip_stitch ribbing the pattern is available in toddler child and adult sizes this hat is a perfect project for a confident beginner not too difficult but with a couple of techniques to offer a challenge slip_stitch ribbing and short row **construction** this hat is crocheted from side to side and seamed at the end at the top of the hat you will skip stitches on alternate row this tapering will give the top of the hat a more rounded shape at the end the hat has extra length to allow you to fold up the brim once finished ---- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe ---- © ned & mimi 2019 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted *
